item.title: Generative AI (GenAI) in HPC Education and Training at 9:00 AM GMT on Mon, Dec 12, 2025
item.description:
Generative AI (GenAI) is already changing how we interact with complex systems, and High-Performance Computing is no exception. GenAI tools offer new pathways for education and user support, from training new users & developing support materials to debugging code and optimizing performance.

Join the ACM SIGHPC Education Chapter for this virtual event to discuss practical applications and early lessons from centers already experimenting with these new tools.

This event featured two presentations from HPC centers that have begun implementing GenAI solutions. Following the presentations, we hosted a discussion for participants to share their own experiences, challenges, and ideas for the future.

item.title: Educational Award For Outstanding Contribution to Computational Science Education at 9:00 AM EDT on Sun, Mar 3, 2026
item.description:
The ACM SIGHPC Education Chapter is announcing an upcoming call for nominations for the 2026 education award to recognize outstanding contributions to computational, data-enabled science, and HPC education and training in all disciplines.

The call for nominations will be issued in March, 2026 with a deadline for submissions on May 31, 2026.

We are seeking candidates who have led projects or programs that have made significant contributions to computational science education defined broadly to include all disciplines and all education levels.
